body:
![Avatar](http://s.gravatar.com/avatar/ece64607c7eb1e4e3941a80d13c1218a?s=150)

### Hello!
I am Daniel Chan, though I typically go by "wicked.fable" online. When I am not messing about, I work as a [freelance graphic designer] (http://spiffup.org). Below you can find the repositories for some of my projects:

***

[Vegetarians Are Crazy](https://github.com/wickedfable/vegetarians-are-crazy)
* Plugin for Minecraft Bukkit servers that makes some crafting recipes vegetarian-friendly. 

[Walk Like Us](https://github.com/wickedfable/walk-like-us)
* Mod for Skyrim that allows players to disguise themselves in order to blend in with NPCs. 


***

### Goodbye!
Sorry, mate, but I have to run. If you would like to get into contact with me, you can shoot an email over to wicked.fable@gmail.com  I will be happy to answer any questions you may have.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Daniel Chan
